#summary Darcs Source Management Extension
The *darcs* extension provides a loader to handle [http://darcs.net darcs] repositories.

= Loader =
The darcs loader either creates a new, empty repository, or runs `darcs get` to duplicate an existing repository.

Its syntax is
{{{
# create a new repository in the root of the task
darcs
# create a new repository in a subdirectory of the task
darcs - SUB/DIR
# load an existing repository
darcs REPOSITORY [SUB/DIR]
}}}

Most commonly, this will look something like
{{{
load_task() {
	darcs http://dev.conio.net/repos/prototype"
}
}}}
